channel.title: CVE Feed for Cisco -- Cisco Small Business Smart and Managed Switches
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cisco -- Cisco Small Business Smart and Managed Switches

item.title: CVE-2021-34739|2024-08-04T00:19:48.160Z -- cisco -- cisco%20small%20business%20smart%20and%20managed%20switches
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of multiple Cisco Small Business Series Switches could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to replay valid user session credentials and gain unauthorized access to the web-based management interface of an affected device. This vulnerability is due to insufficient expiration of session credentials. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack against an affected device to intercept valid session credentials and then replaying the intercepted credentials toward the same device at a later time. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to access the web-based management interface with administrator privileges.
